title: ORNOT Organic Riding Shirt
content:
San Francisco’s ORNOT just stocked a limited run of organic riding shirts ($65) for men and women.

These tech shirts are tailored for riding and comfort in every situation. They feature a unique blend of bamboo and organic cotton that offers an incredibly soft touch and all-day comfort, on or off the bike. You can easily stash your sunglasses with an integrated rear pocket once the sun sets.

Specs:

  • Extremely soft and made for daily wear.
  • Bike specific tailoring.
  • Made using renewable fibers and OEKO-TEX® STANDARD 100 certified fabric.
  • 66% Rayon From Bamboo, 28% Organic Cotton, 6% Spandex
  • Rear placket pocket for sunglasses or other small items.
  • Sewn by hand in the USA.

See more at ORNOT.
